General.Name: SaintMed Public Company Limited
General.Description: SaintMed Public Company Limited imports and distributes medical equipment to private hospitals, clinics, and the general public in Thailand. It also offers sleep monitoring services, as well as rents medical equipment. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.
General.Address: West In Complex Building, Bang Bua Thong, Thailand, 11110
